data.name: MCCALL_ROBINHOOD_T31_005_0
data.text: THE NEXT NIGHT, NEAR THE TOWERING TRONGHOLD OF THE EARL OF THESSLE...

data.name: MCCALL_ROBINHOOD_T31_005_1
data.text: IN THAT MIGHTY PILE OF STONE PROSPERS A MISER- ABLE SOUL ON THE TOIL AND BLOOD OF OTHERS! DO OUR RASCALS RALLY TO OUR CALL, LITTLE- JOHN!?

data.name: MCCALL_ROBINHOOD_T31_005_2
data.text: THE FAT FRIAR TUCK ROUNDS THEM UP, MASTER ROBIN... READY THEY'LL BE WITH ARROWS NOTCHED IF THEY GET THE WORD!

data.name: MCCALL_ROBINHOOD_T31_005_3
data.text:
ROBIN HOOD, AND HIS GIANT
                LIEUTENANT, LITTLEJOHN, GRIMLY STUDY THE
                CASTLE FROM HIDING...

data.name: MCCALL_ROBINHOOD_T31_005_4
data.text: A STRONG FORTRESS IT IS, SIRE, AND METHINRS 'TWOULD BE WELL GUARDED! THERE WOULD BE HARD FIGHTING TO... LOOK, MEN GO TO TOWARD THE GATE!

data.name: MCCALL_ROBINHOOD_T31_005_5
data.text: HUNTSMEN, THEY ARE... SEE, THEY CARRY STAGS TO THE CASTLE THAT THE EARL MAY FEAST! ZOUNDS,LITTLE- JOHN, THEY SHOW US THE WAY ! HASTEN!

data.name: MCCALL_ROBINHOOD_T31_005_6
data.text: SWIFTLY ROBIN LEADS THROUGH THE DENSE BUSH ...THEY RUN CROUCHED LOW, SILENTLY...

data.name: MCCALL_ROBINHOOD_T31_005_7
data.text: STAY! LOOK AHEAD! A STAG IN THE CLEARING! 'TIS SENT US BY DAME FORTUNE HERSELF ! QUIET !

data.name: MCCALL_ROBINHOOD_T31_005_8
data.text:
AT THE EDGE OF THE CLEARING,
                ROBIN STOPS SUDDENLY, POINTS AHEAD...AND
                IN THE SHADOWS IS OUTLINED THE FORM OF A
                STAG...

data.name: MCCALL_ROBINHOOD_T31_005_9
data.text: IN A FLASH, HE UNSLINGS HIS LONG- BOW AND AN ARROW WHINES TOWARD ITS TARGET...

data.name: MCCALL_ROBINHOOD_T31_005_10
data.text: MISSED! BY THE SRINTS, YOU MISSED IT, SIRE ! THE GREATEST ARCHER IN ALL THE REALM HAS ERRED! NEVER BEFORE HAVE I SEEN YOU...

data.name: MCCALL_ROBINHOOD_T31_005_11
data.text: LOOK! THE STAG STILL STANDS ! OUGHT'S AMISS OR THE GAME WOULD BE FAR AMONG THE TREES BY NOW! COME ON !

data.name: MCCALL_ROBINHOOD_T31_005_12
data.text:
THE NEXT SECOND THEY ARE
                GASPING INTO THE CLERRING UNBELIEVINGLY... 5
